name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Fighting Edition
description:
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Fighting Edition is a game directly based on the world-known television series. In this game, you can choice among 8 playable characters: the Power Rangers' Zords (Thunder Megazord, Mega Tigerzord, Ninja Megazord, Shogun Megazord) or some of their known villains (Lipsyncher, Silver Horns, Goldar, Lord Zedd). The title offers 3 game modes: Story Mode (1-Player only), Fighting Mode (2-Player) and Trial Mode (a survival mode for 1-Player only).

During Story Mode, the goal is to defeat all the 4 Zords, the 4 villains up to Lord Zedd and last, but not least, Ivan Ooze. In this mode, you can opt by the Thunder Megazord (formed by the 5 original Rangers) or by the Mega Tigerzord (formed in conjunction with the White Ranger). The Fighting Mode is a traditional 2-Player head-to-head combat, where you can choose any of the 4 Zords or even the 4 villains. Trial Mode is an Endurance-like option, and the main goal is to win as many battles as possible using only 1 health bar (that will be partially replenished after each battle).

As well as many fighting games, you can take advantage of a Power Bar (here, it fills automatically): if you execute a Super Move when this bar is flashing, it will cause more damage, besides increasing 1 level. Once you have reached its maximum status, it's possible to execute power-up versions of Special Moves or even unleash high-damage blows (Super Moves).

shot.caption: Title screen.
Character selection (Story Mode).
Character selection.
Thunder Megazord starts his battle against Mega Tigerzord hit-damaging him with a strengthful punch!
Mega Tigerzord attacks Lipsyncher using an upper-based punch, but she blocks his offensive on time.
Taking advantage of Ninja Megazord's open guard, Thunder Megazord finds space to try a sword attack.
Lipsyncher and Goldar are both measuring forces in a strengthful-punch-grabbing duel: who will win?
Shogun Megazord was so distracted that didn't noticed Mega Tigerzord using his Energy Ball move...
Thunder Megazord trying a sword attack against Silver Horns: the monster strikes back using a punch.
Crouching-blocked, Mega Tigerzord uses the fastest way to avoid Ninja Megazord's energy-geyser blow!
Both Mega Tigerzords are about to end the power-up version of their punching moves: advantage to P2?
Shogun Megazord hit-connecting a spinning-sword hit in Lord Zedd through his move Sword Cyclone.
Lipsyncher was about to be hit-damaged by Thunder Megazord's Dive Kick, but he misses the distance.
Shogun Megazord starts a sword-flaming counterattack against Mega Tigerzord: and it was successful!
Thunder Megazord trying to hit-stop Silver Horns' counterattack only using a crouching-sword hit.
Lipsyncher dashes forward to hit-attack Ninja Megazord, but his dashing punch is about to stop her!
Mega Tigerzord tried, but he couldn't escape from Lord Zedd's Super Move Fingertip Spears damage...
The devastating power of Mega Tigerzord's Super Move Pheniox Strike went too much for Lipsyncher...
If Silver Horns was thinking in an offensive... it was stopped by Thunder Megazord's Thunder Crush!
Using his Super Move Ninja Clones, Ninja Megazord minimizes the danger caused by Shogun Megazord...
P1 Lipsyncher beating P2 Lipsyncher with her Energy Sphere: the shoulder hit is the grand finale!
Goldar jumps to hit-attack Shogun Megazord, but a Super Move named Spire of Fire suddenly stops him!
P1 Goldar tried to find the best opportunity to smash P2 Goldar with his Energy Strike: and he gets!
Before that Silver Horns counterattacked, Lord Zedd used his lightning move to finish it... on time!
Ninja Megazord tried to crouch-block Silver Horns' Lightning Strike, but he fails in the H-hour...
After a fast power-up, Lipsyncher is about to hit-sing Silver Horns through her move Music Strike...
Goldar ground-striking Mega Tigerzord through the long range of his anti-air move Sword Uppercut.
P1 Lord Zedd uses his Magnetic Hand move to successfully stop P2 Lord Zedd's possible counterattack.
P1 Ninja Megazord gets a perfect timing and connects a spinning-throwing blow in P2 Ninja Megazord!
Ivan Ooze throws an Energy Ball against Thunder Megazord, that is trying to sword-low-attack him.
